head.supplied: Form (K) ¶ CLAUSE 25 OF REGULATIONS. ¶ QUARTERLY ESTIMATE. ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir ¶ ,...

div.p: G75/13934, unit 818, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during the two months
ending December 31st.1875.

cell.style: border-top: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-left: none; border-bottom: none; border-right: none; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.0555in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.0555in;

border-top: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-left: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-bottom: none; border-right: none; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.0555in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.0555in;

border-top: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-left: 0.0208in solid #000000; border-bottom: none; border-right: 0.0208in solid #000000; padding-top: 0in; padding-left: 0.0555in; padding-bottom: 0in; padding-right: 0.0555in;
cell.p:
Estimate *
of Expenditure for two months
Quarter struck through and two months inserted.

note.p:
266.13.4 deleted and replaced by
267 , and 367 inserted as a total at bottom of column.

cell.p:
8
6.8 crossed through, but not in the total for the column.

cell.p: Collecting botanic specimens clerical assistance etc.

cell.p: Total — One hundred and eighty three pounds six shillings and eight pence
